original_text: Then they shall put on it a covering of goatskin and spread on top of that a cloth all of blue, and shall put in its poles.
korean_text: 그 위를 해달의 가죽으로 덮고 그 위에 순청색 보자기를 덮은 후에 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: Then they shall put on it a covering of goatskin
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 그것 위에 염소 가죽 덮개를 덮을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and spread on top of that a cloth all of blue
and shall put in its poles.
